%\date{DRAFT--January, 2000.}
\maketitle

\begin{abstract}
One-loop corrections to the 
fermion rest mass $M_1$, wave function renormalization 
$Z_2$ and speed of light renormalization $C_0$ are presented for lattice 
actions that combine improved glue with clover or D234 quark actions 
and keep the temporal and spatial lattice spacings, $a_t$ and $a_s$, distinct.
We explore a range of values for the anisotropy parameter
 $\chi \equiv a_s/a_t$ 
 and treat both massive and massless fermions.
\end{abstract
author: Stefan Groote
